name: Manaspring
description:
Manaspring is a challenging Turn-Based RPG set in a dark fantasy world, filled with magic and awe. Every level is a boss fight and you'll be tested in intense battles before you reach the other side of this crater.

I hope you enjoy the game, play it as many times as you like and answer the Alpha test survey right here!

https://goo.gl/forms/VQhqnovtHHBn3yHf2

Note: The upload is not as up to date as the screenshot, we will update it as soon as possible.
